text: Rudolph Arthur Marcus (born July 21, 1923) is a Canadian-American chemist. He received the 1992 Nobel Prize in ChemistryRudolph A. Marcus: The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 1992 for his theory of electron transfer reactions in chemical systems. The Marcus theory is named after him. Marcus was born in Montreal, Quebec. On July 21, 2023, Marcus turned 100 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Canadian chemists Category:American chemists Category:People from Quebec Category:Canadian Nobel Prize winners Category:American Nobel Prize winners
title: Rudolph A. Marcus
